title: 求助，服务器莫名其妙的开不了了
author: huwei5201314789
txt_content:
RT，昨晚还是好好的，今早起来，就备份了下地图和插件数据，再开服，就无法开服了我开始怀疑是面板服的问题，然后我就用弗拉是XP，下载到我电脑上再开，发现依旧开不了，然后我删了所有MOD和插件，依旧开不了 面板服里显示的错误是[spoiler]
这个是网页面板上显示的错误复制代码 [/spoiler] 然后我下载到我电脑上，在开服，bat显示 QQ截图20160825114151.jpg (23.75 KB, 下载次数: 0) 下载附件 2016-8-25 11:39 上传 然后logs里显示的错误
[spoiler]
[11:45:38] [main/INFO] [FML/]: Forge Mod Loader version 7.10.114.1388 for Minecraft 1.7.10 loading [11:45:39] [main/INFO] [FML/]: Java is Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM, version 1.8.0_91, running on Windows 7:amd64:6.1, installed at C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.8.0_91 [11:45:39] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper/]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLInjectionAndSortingTweaker [11:45:39] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper/]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLDeobfTweaker [11:45:39] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper/]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLInjectionAndSortingTweaker [11:45:39] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper/]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLInjectionAndSortingTweaker [11:45:39] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper/]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.CoreModManager$FMLPluginWrapper [11:45:43] [main/ERROR] [FML/]: There is a binary discrepency between the expected input class nq (nq) and the actual class. Checksum on disk is 5e0782bd, in patch 1d691c9e. Things are probably about to go very wrong. Did you put something into the jar file? [11:45:43] [main/ERROR] [FML/]: The game is going to exit, because this is a critical error, and it is very improbable that the modded game will work, please obtain clean jar files. 复制代码 [/spoiler] 我用了机翻翻译了这错误的意思，jar。。我以为是服务端的问题，然后我特意去重新下载了最新的MCPC-forge-1388的（之前用的也是这个） 再然后，把原本的服务端删了，加上重新下载的MCPC-forge-1388 报错陡然一换，就成了下面这个。。。
[spoiler]
[11:49:51] [main/INFO] [FML/]: Forge Mod Loader version 7.10.114.1388 for Minecraft 1.7.10 loading [11:49:52] [main/INFO] [FML/]: Java is Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM, version 1.8.0_91, running on Windows 7:amd64:6.1, installed at C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.8.0_91 [11:49:52] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper/]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLInjectionAndSortingTweaker [11:49:52] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper/]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLDeobfTweaker [11:49:52] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper/]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLInjectionAndSortingTweaker [11:49:52] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper/]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLInjectionAndSortingTweaker [11:49:52] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper/]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.CoreModManager$FMLPluginWrapper [11:49:55] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper/]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.relauncher.CoreModManager$FMLPluginWrapper [11:49:55] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper/]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.FMLDeobfTweaker [11:49:56] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper/]: Loading tweak class name cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.TerminalTweaker [11:49:56] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper/]: Calling tweak class cpw.mods.fml.common.launcher.TerminalTweaker [11:49:57] [main/INFO] [LaunchWrapper/]: Launching wrapped minecraft {net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer} 复制代码[/spoiler] 话说，我终于会用隐藏文字+代码编辑框了，太不容易了{:10_493:},我知道我写这些，等于写短篇小说，麻烦大家，以及会的高手大神们，帮忙解决。 不然我今天一天都开不了服{:10_503:}，昨天晚上哦不，是今天凌晨3点，还是好好的，根本没有动过插件和MOD，以及服务器的设置。 就关了下服，再过了几个小时，就这样了，不过注意下，我下载到我电脑上的服务器，删除了所有插件和MOD！一样开不了！

replies.author: huwei5201314789
replies.txt_content: 呃。好吧，还是没用出来。。。{:10_493:}隐藏文字那个。。。不能预览太蛋疼，自然而然的。。就不知道什么情况了。@lichi2050  @XJue_DaDa 还有没被@到的大家，帮帮忙啊。。表示我看不懂英文{:10_503:}

replies.author: huwei5201314789
replies.txt_content:
huwei5201314789 发表于 2016-8-25 11:59
呃。好吧，还是没用出来。。。隐藏文字那个。。。不能预览太蛋疼，自然而然的。。就不知道什么情 ...
我服，最上面的没有发出来。麻烦通融通融= =
这是网页面板的错误。。。

replies.author: 中国作死风
replies.txt_content:
huwei5201314789 发表于 2016-8-25 14:11
呃，那能解释下，为何会突然出现这个情况？今天凌晨还好好的
我也不太清楚233

replies.author: huwei5201314789
replies.txt_content:
中国作死风 发表于 2016-8-25 12:59
换一个forge版本的mcpc+
呃，那能解释下，为何会突然出现这个情况？今天凌晨还好好的

replies.author: huwei5201314789
replies.txt_content:
中国作死风 发表于 2016-8-25 14:04
我也不太清楚233
换了，依旧一样，开不了，会不会是服务端内的某个文件被更改了？
然后导致出问题？
能远程帮忙看看吗？

从翻译里抠出来这个
[11:49:52] [main/INFO] [FML/]: Java is Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM, version 1.8.0_91, running on Windows 7:amd64:6.1, installed at C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.8.0_91 
[11:49:52][主要/信息][FML /]:Java Java HotSpot(TM)64位服务器虚拟机,1.8.0_91版本,运行在Windows 7:amd64:6.1,安装在C:\Program?Files\Java\ jre1.8.0_91
[11:45:43] [main/ERROR] [FML/]: There is a binary discrepency between the expected input class nq (nq) and the actual class. Checksum on disk is 5e0782bd, in patch 1d691c9e. Things are probably about to go very wrong. Did you put something into the jar file? 
[11:45:43][主要/错误][FML /]:预期之间存在另外一个二进制输入类nq(nq)和实际的类。磁盘上的校验和是5 e0782bd,补丁1 d691c9e。大概都是非常错误的。你把东西放在jar文件了吗?
[11:45:43] [main/ERROR] [FML/]: The game is going to exit, because this is a critical error, and it is very improbable that the modded game will work, please obtain clean jar files. 
[11:45:43][主要/错误][FML /]:游戏要退出,因为这是一个重要的错误,这是非常不可思议的一些游戏会工作,请获得干净的jar文件。
